name: Offline game
description:
Hello! Welcome to the Offline game! This game is in development and will get updates! In this game, you fight green Ghost that have 999 HP. Thought they have more HP than you, you still can fight them! Theres 3 rooms:1 is fight with ghost, 2 infinity runner and 3 is final room, where you have to close game like you completed it. This game will receive update tomorrow!

-----Changelog-----

2.0 28.10.2018

-Added rooms to hide from ghosts

-Added more ghosts

-Added secret ending(tip:shoot)

-Still no modding

-Player number increased(in 1 room but not means multiplayer added(dont think about multiplayer & forget write that in changelog)
